name: Die Twice (Gábor Urbán)
description:
In this game you are a die and by jumping you do area of effect damage on your opponents. Rescue the other die and defeat the boss with high numbers to become victorious. There are power ups rewarded for defeating opponents that refill your die's HP and your die may also change shape.

Controls:

Use the arrow keys to move, Space to jump/throw the die. You cannot move during the throw, so use it wisely. Press Esc anytime to close the program.

This game has been made for GMTK Game Jam 2022 for the theme 'Roll of the Dice'under 50 hours. Software used for making: Unity, Aseprite (healthbars), FL Studio (short background music),. Blender (die models), bfxr (sound effects).
